task.title: Disallow external redirects
Centralize authorization
Avoid sending detailed error messages to remote systems
Ensure confidential data is sent over an encrypted channel

weakness.title: Secure Section Must Require SSL Access
HTTP Basic Logins Sent Over Unencrypted Connection

task.title: Set secure flag on session cookies
Set HttpOnly flag on session cookies

weakness.title: Set-Cookie does not use HTTPOnly Keyword

task.title: Authorize every page
Apply principles of privacy when handling personal information
Avoid nested expressions based on unvalidated input
Verify that third party libraries do not have any outstanding security patches

weakness.title: Multiple Full Path Disclosures in Php-Nuke
CA Unicenter Common Services Database Password Disclosure
Microsoft ASP.NET URI Canonicalization Remote Information Disclosure Vulnerability

task.title: Review non-categorized/miscellaneous findings from static code analysis
Restrict access to WSDL
Invalidate old session ID after authentication
Prevent buffer overflow/underflow
Avoid uncontrolled format string
Follow security best practices when dealing with pointers
Securely delete any unprotected sensitive data
Enforce absolute session timeouts
Use anti cross site request forgery (CSRF) tokens
Perform input validation on all forms of input
Verify integrity of client-supplied read-only data
Specify HTTP protocol limits in the server settings
Escape untrusted data in HTML, HTML attributes, Cascading Style Sheets and JavaScript
Bind variables in SQL statements
Disallow carriage returns and line feeds when adding data to HTTP response headers
Use XML encoding when interacting with XML data
Use Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) encoding when interacting with LDAP data
Avoid relying on untrusted data for server side page, view, or template selection
Avoid unsafe operating system interaction
Implement a global error handler and generic default error page for end users
Remove/disable unused, test or debug code and data
Minimum password standards
Use indirect object reference maps if accessing files
Validate file contents
Lockdown passwords in property and configuration files (e.g. database connection strings)

task.title: Do not hard code passwords
Only use approved cryptographic algorithms and key lengths
